actions.text: On agreeing to the Buck amendment (A110) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A110) offered by Mr. Buck.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Buck amendment (A110) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following:    SEC.___. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to pay the salaries and expenses of personnel or any other entity to negotiate or conclude a settlement with the Federal Government that includes terms requiring the defendant to donate or contribute funds to an organization or individual.
purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to pay the salaries and expenses of personnel or any other entity to negotiate or conclude a settlement with the Federal Government that includes terms requiring the defendant to donate or contribute funds to an organization or individual.
